structure.unit: ARTICLE B. - STREET USE AND CLEANLINESS

law.text: Every manhole or other aperture located within the sidewalk areas of the City and used for delivering coal into the basement of an adjacent building shall be located within two (2) feet of the curb line of the street. Coal shall not be permitted to be shoveled or thrown across the sidewalk. (Code 1959 , ยง19-20)
